review.title: “Stability and good conditions”
review.pros: Pros – Stable position, relaxed atmosphere, social packet, competitive salary
review.cons: Cons – Maybe too stable and conservative. It makes the whole structure inefficient. Not good for an ambitious and creative person looking for self-realization.
